title: Sweet pierogi
description: These sweet pierogi topped with crystallised mint make for an impressive dessert. You could try adding strawberries and raspberries to this recipe or using any summer berries you fancy.
ingredients: handful of large mint leaves, picked from their stems
2 tbsp caster sugar, plus a little extra for cooking
100ml/3½fl oz sour cream or crème fraiche
1 tbsp icing sugar, plus more for sprinkling
